# Herbicides Product Images

Place herbicide product images in this folder. Images are loaded automatically based on product names in the products database.

## Expected Images

- fire-all-480.jpg
- imara-2-4-d.jpg
- beanpoa-480.jpg
- biso-10-sc.jpg
- maysfix-300.jpg
- bypass-288.jpg

Each image filename should match the `imageUrl` property in the products database (without the folder path).
